title: 'Excellent!'
body: I loved the material. It's nice, soft and not at all transparent, like some other leggings I tried. Very comfortable. The fitting is also perfect. I like that these are long chudidar style leggings than only ankle length ones. The colour is a soft gold which looks very classy. Those who want a jazzier look might find it plain, but I found it perfect as I prefer a sober style. Well worth the money. It's great for formal occasions.
